Instantly.AddIRCMessage: !ANNOUNCEMENT! CHANNEL HAS BEEN RESETED @channel
The fuck?..
Clara, listen to me
I've just saved your ass from Omicron
And we need to strike him back no matter what!
What happened?
Omicron tried to do to you the same thing he did to me
Make you outlaw
Uploading a fabricated dirt files on you to FBI
That doesn't make any sense, I am innocent
I did nothing wrong as well and look at me
Feds won't take 'I am innocent' as an argument
And Omicron has a lot of experience of making scapegoats, I am sure of it
I could've find his location but for some reason decided to save you
So it is your turn to help me
Did I asked you to do so?
What the fuck do you mean? I JUST SAVED YOU
And I didn't asked you to do so
I know that you are responsible for an attack on our servers
Your NightHawks buddies are gone mad and destroying our infrastructure
It will be a pure chaos soon
So yeah, you are not so innocent, Vortex, and I am not willing to help you
And sure as fuck not asking you to help me one way or another
What I did wrong, huh?
Oh, I can tell you, I made a research on you, Vortex
So here is the list of your actions:
You were good more or less but in the end you fucked everything up
Shit...
I don't recognize my old Captain Mendes
Who always says that there is a way to make things right to justice
Now I only see a man who obsessed with vengeance and nothing more
Why you saved me then? Some moral strings are being pulled inside of you?
I can see it now
My god, what I've turned into...
A monster, that is who you really are
I am so sorry Clara, I was so furious and failed to see how many bad things I made
It's not supposed to be like that...
I don't trust you and I don't want to talk to you anymore
Your actions are terrible and unforgivable
I can only agree on one thing
Omicron is a threat and he must be in jail
I will start that hunt and will make things right, without any sacrifices
Wait, you can't bring him down alone, he will turn things upside down really quickly!
I won't listen to you any longer
It is just such a pitty that a good man turned into such a monstrosity
I won't go after Omicron if that requires more violence or sacrifices, I understand my mistakes and...
Fuck, I'll just drop that case and wait for better moment so I don't have to become monster once again
I am not interested in your self remorse
You made actions and you face consequences
That's my point of view
Farewell...

Clara?..
Don't do this to me...
